name: Oceanographer Cat
description:
Play as a mermaid cat who’s on an adventure to take photos of ocean creatures! There are 14 total creatures to find. We totally forgot to add an ending, but you can still feel good about yourself for finding all 14…uh, right?

Controls: Hold and release ‘space’ to move. Hold and release the ‘F’ key to use the camera. Both are aimed with the mouse.
